pages.text: $(li)The Soul Speed enchantment can be applied in any kind of Boots.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the walking speed while you are in any kind of Soul blocks, like Soul Sand or Soul Soil.
pages.title: Soul Speed

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Soul Speed).
